name: Crazy Relocation
description:
Crazy Relocation is an absurd-style physics-based puzzle game that turns your familiar environment into a Crazy obstacle course! You need perfect planning and an iron will to balance the cargo stacked on a vehicle and deliver it to your destination!

Features

- Physical simulation based transport system, because you can try to use the display life experience!

- Rich from easy to difficult levels to challenge your limits!

- Various vehicles and cargoes make the level look familiar yet different!

- Physical simulation based driving system, so just piling up is not enough, it's time to test your driving skills.
